Hero.intro: helping prenatal, ultrasound, and fertility clinics reduce admin work, prevent booking errors, and manage staff availability across multiple locations — without forcing medical workflows into generic software.

Mission.tagline: Built from real clinic operations — not theory
Mission.headline:
for over 6 years, I’ve been responsible for the technical operations of a multi-location prenatal screening clinic in the Netherlands.

When existing booking plugins failed to handle staff availability, locations, and medical service logic, I designed a custom system that fits how clinics actually work.

Services.s1_desc: Ongoing maintenance and monitoring of your clinic website and booking system to ensure stability, security, and uptime.
Services.s2_desc: Custom appointment systems built for clinics that operate across multiple services, staff members, or locations.
Services.s3_desc: Improve performance, reliability, and workflows as your clinic grows.

Proof.label: [ PROOF ]
Proof.text: Currently supporting a multi-location prenatal screening clinic with online appointment booking and staff scheduling across four locations.
